title: Replace Design Principles block with single-line principle on Auth screen

requirements.text: Update the authentication screen (AuthGate) to replace the current multi-line Design Principles list (Minimal / Neutral / Language-first / Slightly uncomfortable / Clarity over comfort / Silence is intentional.) with exactly one user-facing line: “You restate what you’re already telling yourself.”

quotes:
Replace with only ONE line, not six.

“You restate what you’re already telling yourself.”

acceptanceCriteria: AuthGate no longer renders the six individual principle lines.
AuthGate renders exactly the sentence “You restate what you’re already telling yourself.” as the sole design-principle text.
No other user-facing text changes occur as part of this update.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not modify files under frontend immutablePaths (compose existing UI components instead).
nonGoals: Do not change onboarding questions, daily/weekly reflection logic, or text synthesis rules.
Do not add new features (goals, reminders, dashboards, additional prompts).
